QuestData.Title: Mission Improbable
QuestData.Description: I have a special mission that requires a well equipped, competent $c. As I have no one else to spare, I suppose I'll have to settle for you...$b$bThe enemy has assaulted Warsong Lumber Camp and cut it off from the rest of our forces. An important blood elf diplomat en route to Orgrimmar is trapped there.$b$bShe must be liberated.$b$bTake the road northeast and light the smoldering brazier to summon our operative there. Do whatever he might require of you.$b$bDismissed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kadrak wants you to light the Smoldering Brazier across from Satyrnaar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Krokk at the Smoldering Brazier across from Satyrnaar.
QuestData.RewardText: You have your work cut out for you here, friend.$b$bLet's hope that you're up to the task,,,,
